index.title: Cakes by Katie
index.description: Cake maker in Thatcham, near Newbury and Reading, in West Berkshire, who offers high quality bespoke cakes and cupcakes for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, corporate events, or any occasion.

about.title: About me | Cakes by Katie
about.description: I'm a cake maker in Thatcham, West Berkshire, offering high quality bespoke cakes for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, christenings, or any occasion.

portfolio.title: Portfolio | Cakes by Katie
portfolio.description: See all the high quality bespoke cakes and cupcakes I have made for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, corporate events and other occasions. I am based in Thatcham, West Berkshire, near Newbury and Reading.

testimonials.title: Testimonials | Cakes by Katie
testimonials.description: Read some of the glowing testimonials I have received for my bespoke cakes and cupcakes from my many wonderful customers.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Cakes by Katie
faqs.description: Find the answers to some questions I commonly get asked by my customers.

questions.question: Where are you based?
questions.answer: I'm based in Thatcham, West Berkshire, so I am in easy reach of Basingstoke, Newbury, Reading, and their surrounding vicinities such as Basildon, Bucklebury, Coldash, Didcot, Donnington, Hungerford, Pangbourne, Purley, Sulhampstead, Tadley, Theale, Tidmarsh and Tilehurst.

questions.question: What occasions do you cater for?
questions.answer: I can make cakes for all occasions! Have you got a wedding, birthday or anniversary coming up? Maybe a religious occasion such as a christening, first communion or bar/bat mitzvah? Is there a little one involved - do you need a baby shower, gender reveal or cake smash cake? How about a cake to celebrate Christmas, Easter, Halloween or Valentine's Day? Or maybe you need something completely different? Get in touch with me at katie@cakesbykatie.co.uk and we'll start planning for your occasion!

questions.question: What finishes do you provide?
questions.answer: Cakes can be finished in either buttercream or fondant. I also provide semi naked cakes for weddings.

questions.question: Do you cater for any special dietary requirements?
questions.answer: Yes, I make gluten free and dairy free cakes. I also offer a reduced flavour range for vegans. I encourage you to get in touch and we can discuss whatever requirements you have. Please note that whilst the cakes will be made using free from products, they're made in a kitchen where the allergens are present.

questions.question: Do you deliver?
questions.answer: Wedding cakes will be delivered and set up at the venue. All other cakes are on a collection basis, but I can deliver for a fee.

questions.question: What products do you offer?
questions.answer: I offer wedding cakes, celebration cakes and cupcakes in a range of flavours (I don't produce fresh cream or fresh fruit cakes).

questions.question: How do I order a cake?
questions.answer: Get in touch with me at katie@cakesbykatie.co.uk and we'll start discussing your perfect cake/cupcakes!

questions.question: What cake design should I go for?
questions.answer: Whether you know exactly what you want or have absolutely no idea, I'll work with you to create the perfect design for your occasion. If you're looking for inspiration why not check out my portfolio page?

questions.question: What are your payment terms?
questions.answer: Payment is by bank transfer. For celebration cakes and cupcakes I ask for a 50% deposit on order confirmation to secure your booking with the balance payable one week prior to collection/delivery. For wedding cakes, a £100 date reservation deposit is payable when you decide to book with me, with the balance due one month before your wedding. All deposits are non-refundable.

occasions.title: Occasions | Cakes by Katie
occasions.description: I'm a cake maker in Thatcham, near Newbury and Reading, West Berkshire, offering high quality bespoke cakes for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, corporate events, or any occasion.

birthday.title: Birthday cakes and cupcakes | Cakes by Katie
birthday.description: Cakes by Katie is a cake maker in Thatcham, Berkshire, near Newbury and Reading, offering bespoke birthday cakes and cupcakes in a wide range of flavours and catering for specific dietary requirements.

products.name: Buttercream cakes
products.description: Buttercream cakes are finished completely in buttercream in either one or more colours to produce the desired effect. The finish can be smooth or textured.

products.name: Fondant cakes
products.description: Cakes are covered in a smooth layer of sugarpaste and can be decorated with flowers, objects or figures modelled from fondant icing.

products.name: Themed cakes
products.description: Themed cakes allow the design to be tailored to the recipient in terms of their likes, hobbies and personality for example.

products.name: Birthday cupcakes
products.description: Birthday cupcakes are easy to share and customise with a decoration of your choice and available in both standard and deluxe flavours. If some of your party have dietary requirements, cupcakes are a good way to cater for them separately. Cupcakes can also make a special birthday gift and can be presented in a gift box finished with ribbon and a bow and candle.

products.name: Carved cakes
products.description: Cut to the desired shape, hand carved cakes bring to life the cake design.

products.name: Edible images
products.description: Edible images can be placed on either a buttercream or fondant finished cake. They offer greater design flexibility and are cheaper than fondant models. An edible image of a favourite photograph will also add that personal touch.

products.name: Airbrushing
products.description: Airbrushing adds an exciting dimension to a fondant cake, introducing additional colour either as an abstract or block design. Blending the colours can also add depth.

products.name: Pinata cakes
products.description: These cakes have a hidden surprise and have a special appeal to children. They can be filled with sweets or chocolate.

products.name: Money cakes
products.description: Money, attached to a cake topper, is inserted into clear film wallets encased in a plastic box that is hidden inside the cake. Just pull out the topper and the money roll is revealed! Great for a 21st or other milestone birthday.

products.name: Balloons
products.description: Topping the cake with a balloon gives an extra touch.

cta.text: Want a quote for a birthday cake?

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for making the amazing birthday cake for Nic's birthday! She was over the moon with it. We took it with us to her mother's for tea and cake and everyone was amazed at how well presented it was. It tasted amazing too.
testimonial.name: Scott

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you so much for making the cake! It was absolutely delicious and Emily loved the design.
testimonial.name: Alex

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a massive thank you for making my mum's 60th birthday cake…it was amazing, it looked fab and tasted amazing. Your buttercream is to die for…my mum was over the moon with it.
testimonial.name: Penny

testimonial.text: The cake was a wonderful success. Looked and tasted beautiful! Thanks Katie
testimonial.name: Anne

testimonial.text: Another party and another incredible cake, thank you so much for William’s cake - he loved it and the best sponge!
testimonial.name: Sarah

testimonial.text: Thank you for the fantastic cakes! The boys loved them. So many compliments from the parents on how tasty the cake was.
testimonial.name: Lisa

testimonial.text: The cake is incredible. Thank you so much!! Delicious!
testimonial.name: Rob

testimonial.text: Thank you SO much for the lion cake last weekend, it was absolutely delicious, lots of compliments and everyone loved it - thank you!
testimonial.name: Sarah

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a big thank you on behalf of my son and daughter-in-law for the cake. It was incredible and they were delighted with it.
testimonial.name: Anne

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a very big thank you for creating a wonderful first birthday cake for George. I had so many people asking where it was from, and it tasted delicious. Needless to say it’s all gone!
testimonial.name: Lucy

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you for doing our birthday cake! It looked and tasted amazing, and your suggestions of how much we'd need were spot on as there was just a few slices left (which got eaten today!!).
testimonial.name: Kristy

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you so much, the cupcakes were amazing and my partner was really surprised! They didn't last long at all. We'll definitely be using you again for future events/birthdays!
testimonial.name: Alexandra

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the stunning wedding cake, we were all delighted with it!
testimonial.name: June

testimonial.text: Just wanted to thank you for the birthday cakes. They were fabulous! They looked amazing and also tasted wonderful. I was lucky to get a piece to try myself as they were so popular with everyone.
testimonial.name: Sue

testimonial.text: Wanted to say a huge thank you for the cakes. They were amazing and went down very well!
testimonial.name: Paul

milk-float.name: The Fastest Milk Float in the West

testimonial.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH for the cake. It looked beautiful thank you and it's all gone! Everyone enjoyed eating it. Sorry I didn't see you Saturday, but thank you, it was fantastic!!
testimonial.name: Robyn

testimonial.text: Just to say my customer was very complimentary about your cake, so thank you so much for squeezing us in. Will definitely be using your services again.
testimonial.name: Forever and a day Events

a-touch-of-pink-birthday-edition.name: A Touch of Pink - Birthday Edition

a-touch-of-pink-with-chocolate.name: A Touch of Pink with Chocolate

testimonial.text: Just wanted to thank you for the wonderful cake! It was perfect and tasted amazing.
testimonial.name: Claire

testimonial.text: A huge thank you for the absolutely stunning cake; it's really taken my breath away. It was certainly a centre piece, it had lots of great comments and tasted delicious. Thank you again for everything.
testimonial.name: Tracy

testimonial.text: The cake was splendid... AND delicious. Thank you soooo much Katie. Half gone! Lots left to enjoy! I shall recommend you to anyone who needs a special cake for a special occasion.
testimonial.name: Marilyn

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say thank you so much for the cake! It's literally perfect and better than the photos, thank you!!
testimonial.name: Chloe

testimonial.text: Just to say thank you for the beautiful and delicious birthday cake you delivered to me yesterday.  My daughter and the family loved the cake and we will definitely recommend you.
testimonial.name: Lynne

a-touch-of-pink-with-chocolate.name: A Touch of Pink with Chocolate

testimonial.text: Thank you for the lovely chocolate cake. It was so moist and delicious and everyone enjoyed it
testimonial.name: Maureen

testimonial.text: The cupcakes were great thanks - very tasty and a great finish on them.
testimonial.name: Andy

ttmc-cupcakes.name: The Traffic Management Company Corporate Cupcakes

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say a very big thank you for the lovely "old suitcase" cake you made for my son's 30th birthday/bon voyage party. I know that I didn't give you much advanced notice and I'm so pleased you were able to make it. A lot of guests asked me where I had bought the cake from as they were very impressed by all the details in the decoration, plus it tasted really great when we cut in to it.
testimonial.name: Yvonne

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say thank you for such a great cake. It looked and tasted amazing and is almost gone already!!
testimonial.name: Nicola

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the lime birthday cake. It was beautifully presented and absolutely delicious.
testimonial.name: Caroline

testimonial.text: The cake was a great success. Everyone was very complimentary about it. It tasted so good too.
testimonial.name: Vanessa

testimonial.text: Just to say a Big Thank you for making us this superb wedding anniversary cake. We can see that you have gone that extra mile for us; everyone at the party just loved it.
testimonial.name: Lilian & David

testimonial.text: Thank you very much for the lovely cake, it was absolutely gorgeous in all the possible ways. Everybody really enjoyed it and admired your work.
testimonial.name: Rosemary

testimonial.text: Big thank you to Katie, for producing three amazing creations for me, some cupcakes for my daughter's 18th birthday and a friend's 50th, and a birthday cake for my daughter's birthday the following year. They were all delicious. On each occasion I gave Katie a brief or the birthday theme and she worked with me to design the toppers and gave me options to choose from, even a choice of flavours for the cupcakes. Katie added an extra special touch to each occasion, thank you and I would have no hesitation in recommending you to others in the future.
testimonial.name: Ellie

testimonial.text: Somebody brought some of Katie's cupcakes into the office one day and we all enjoyed them so much that we decided to place a regular order. I've also used Katie a couple of times for special celebration cakes. They looked amazing, but more importantly tasted amazing too. Katie is now my go-to person for all my cake requirements. It's refreshing to see a young person with a business like this. Katie is really friendly and talented. So, give Katie a try - you won't be disappointed!
testimonial.name: Andy

choc-fudge-cake.description: The ultimate chocolate fudge cake; featuring hidden milky bar buttons, milky bar drip and milky bar button stars.

oreo-cake.name: Oreo
oreo-cake.description: Caution: Cake may break apart when twisted and dunked. But feel free to lick it - well only your slice.

oreo-cupcakes.name: Oreo Cupcakes
oreo-cupcakes.description: Twist off the wrapper, lick off the icing, dunk in the milk - just like a real Oreo.

lemon-and-pink-gin-cupcakes.name: Lemon & Pink Gin Cupcakes
lemon-and-pink-gin-cupcakes.description: For when it's not quite 5 O'clock … shall we?

smores-cupcakes.name: S'mores Cupcakes
smores-cupcakes.description: Not just for the nights snuggled and singing round the campfire.

salted-caramel-cupcakes.name: Salted Caramel Cupcakes
salted-caramel-cupcakes.description: Contains salted caramel - need I say more?

jammie-dodger-cake.name: Jammie Dodger Cake
jammie-dodger-cake.description: Bring back childhood memories one slice at a time.

easter-surprise.name: Easter Surprise
easter-surprise.description: You may have just stumbled upon the Easter Bunny's secret stash…

easter-nest-cupcakes.name: Easter Nest Cupcakes
easter-nest-cupcakes.description: The best type of eggs you will ever find in a nest - shame it's only at easter.

death-by-choc.name: Death by Chocolate
death-by-choc.description: Chocolate, chocolate, chocolate, chocolate, chocolate, chocolate, chocolate, chocolate, chocolate … oh and sprinkles!

st-patricks-day.name: St. Patrick's Day
st-patricks-day.description: No need to hunt down the end of a rainbow when you can find some gold coins right here (psst they maybe chocolate coins instead).

romantic-heart.name: Romantic Heart
romantic-heart.description: Chocolate, strawberries, cake: what more do you need for a romantic night in? Whether it's valentine's day, an anniversary or just to give to that special person in your life - you will need a cake like this to celebrate the occasion.

reading-football-shirt.name: Reading Football Shirt
reading-football-shirt.description: If you are in the Stephen Hunt for a Reading FC cake then you don't need to look any Shane Long-er. This shirt can be adapted for any team.

wonder-woman.name: Wonder Woman
wonder-woman.description: I would say have a Marvel at this cake - but we both know it's DC.

testimonial.text:
We were blown away by Alice's cake. You had really listened to our ideas and understood the effect were looking for. Everyone commented on the cake and Alice will always remember her 6th birthday cake. 
Thanks for helping make her day so special.
testimonial.name: Mel

football-cupcakes.name: Football Cupcakes
football-cupcakes.description: Why not score yourself some of these cupcakes?

choo-choo.name: Choo Choo
choo-choo.description: All aboard! If you ask me for this cake, rest assured these are two trains that will show up on time.  There's no chance of me turning up with a replacement bus cake!  Designed for birthday twins Fenton and Lochlan, the carriages are carrying their favourite treats and travelling to imaginary towns Fentonville and Lockland.

testimonial.text: Katie is an outstanding baker!  We have used her services for birthday cakes for our boys and an anniversary cake for parents.  Her cakes taste delicious and look amazing.  Katie takes the time to design the cake to your requirements and communicates very clearly with her customers. Her cakes are decorated to an extremely professional standard.   We would recommend Katie without hesitation and can guarantee you won't be disappointed!
testimonial.name: Lisa

gift-roses.name: Gift Roses
gift-roses.description: This small cake is just enough for a few and enrobed in elegant buttercream roses with a cute gift tag just for that finishing touch.

testimonial.text: Katie's cake not only looked amazing but it tasted delicious and kept really well when we didn't eat it all on 1st cutting. Her design ideas were spot on and it was difficult to choose the best one!
testimonial.name: Mel

gucci.name: Gucci
gucci.description: Do they want something Gucci for their birthday? This is definitely the cheaper option!

guinness.name: Guinness
guinness.description: Made of more - if 'more' is three layers of sponge, black and white fondant, an edible logo and a very cool antigravity effect.

friends.name: Friends
friends.description: OH. MY. GOD! Could this cake BE any more perfect for that Friends fan in your life - be they family, friend or your lobster (unless you're on a break)? Just don't offer any to Joey because he doesn't share food! Okay, I'm done now…

chocoholic.name: Chocoholic
chocoholic.description: Chocolate fan? Then you'll love this two tiered chocolate fudge cake surrounded by white and milk chocolate fingers and topped with maltesers . Psst… there's even white chocolate buttons between the layers!
